RelatedPhrase.word: He qualified his friend as an ambitious selfseeker

list.key: He qualified his friend as an ambitious selfseeker
list.exp: 他把所得利润的一半交给歹徒作为保护费
list.abs: 他把收集硬币作为一种业余爱好。He was paying out half his profits as protection.他把所得利润的一半交给歹徒作为保护费.He qualified his friend as an ambitious selfseeker.

entry.tran: 追逐私利的;只顾自己的
entry.def: If you describe someone as self-seeking, you disapprove of them because they are interested only in doing things which give them an advantage over other people.

example.ex: He said that democracy would open the way for self-seeking politicians to abuse the situation.
example.tran: 他说民主会为追逐私利的政客大开方便之门，使他们趁机以公谋私。

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
